title: How to Choose and Wear a Protective Cup for Sports
summary: Many men choose to leave themselves vulnerable by not wearing a protective cup while playing sports. This is likely a result of cups being considered uncomfortable and restrictive. This article will explain about the two different styles of cups and about how to wear a cup so that it is comfortable and non-restrictive.
actions: {"1": "Step into cup-jockstrap and pull elasticized leg straps up around legs, and the waist-strap firmly around waist with the hard cup at the front of your body and over your genitals.", "2": "Insert testicles into bottom and narrower end of cup.", "3": "With triangular-shaped cup, lift penis up and lay across inside top of cup.", "4": "The cup should obscure genitalia.", "5": "Remove when finished and clean."}
things_needed: A goalie cup features extra padding around the cup holder, and also on the front side of the waistband. Goalies facing fast and hard slap-shots should double-cup. Either wear a banana cup underneath the goalie cup or purchase a goalie cup that features a "double cup.",Boxers wear a cup that have a wide, padded waistband all the way around, to protect the kidneys. They are worn over or under shorts. However, better protection will be delivered to the groin wearing the cup under the shorts. Some manufacturers of "no-foul" boxing cups are now realizing that their boxing cup-protector must fit real tight against the body to provide 100% protection. A boxer should never go down in pain because his "no-foul" cup-protector didn't protect him adequately. Currently, it is likely that the big leather no-foul protectors are being re-designed to provide for a very tight fitting cup-protector which will completely eliminate the impact of a "low blow" to a boxer.,Some soccer and basketball players prefer to wear a "soft" cup, that is made of a pliable plastic. It's not as protective as a hard cup, but allows for some protection applicable to less-risk sporting games. However, if you feel you need more protection when playing these sports then you will want to wear a hard cup.

summary: can be accomplished easily. You can use a dry method for ordinary pinstriping but not with reflective pinstriping or reflective tape. actions: {"1": "Pick your installation pathway for the pin striping or reflective tape first, then mark this path.", "2": "Attach the first 1" to the front of the car, usually the fender.", "3": "After completing the first half of the car, repeat this same procedure from the ending point to the rear of the car exactly.", "4": "Tackle all openings such as the hinge and latch side of the door.", "5": "Tap your finger lightly all along the pinstriping or reflective tape to insure it is sticking, then you can lightly wipe it down with your finger using a light pressure."}

Reflective tapes or Pinstripe should not be stretched. Excessive stretching can cause cracking in the reflectors base and will damage the tape.

title: How to Know and Measure How Much Protein Is Too Much

actions: {"1": "Get 60 mining for access into the Mining Guild.", "2": "Mine Coal in places like Falador's Mining Guild.", "3": "When you have 1000 + iron and 2000+ coal, start smelting it into steel.", "4": "Sell it to the members at the forum.", "5": "As you get better, move on to mithril, adamant, and once you are exceptionally good, move onto rune."}
things_needed: Level 60 Mining,Level 30-48 Smithing,Level 55 Magic High Alchemy (optional)

title: How to Grow Miracle Fruit
summary: ) is a tropical native from West Africa. When chewed, the fruit coats the taste buds, which causes sour food to taste sweet! What's more, this neat change can last for up to two hours. Not grown commercially in many places, it's a fun one to trial in a tropical back garden. Here is what to do.
actions: {"1": "Find a position in full sun.", "2": "Choose well drained soil.", "3": "Keep the plant well watered.", "4": "Keep the plant well fed.", "5": "Keep tidy."}
things_needed: Nursery to obtain the plant,Garden spade to dig hole for planting

title: How to Make Carob Nut Fudge
summary: This "fantastic" recipe is not only delicious, but is also a healthy alternative to chocolate fudge! Read on!
actions: {"1": "Combine honey and peanut butter in a pot and cook over low heat, stirring with wooden spoon.", "2": "When the mixture becomes a liquid, remove from heat.", "3": "Add carob powder, nuts or seeds, vanilla and coconut.", "4": "Mix the ingredients thoroughly for a smooth fudge, or hardly mix them at all for a lumpy fudge.", "5": "Spoon and spread the mixture into pan."}
things_needed: Pot,Wooden spoon,Oven or hot plate

title: How to Keep Wooden Window Frame Paintwork in Good Shape
summary: Windows are subject to moisture all year round, and this can impact the durability of the paintwork on a wooden window frame. The problem with poor paintwork is that you risk your windows rotting or warping when the moisture seeps into the wood. To maintain the paintwork longer, this article suggests a number of things that you can do.
actions: {"1": "Use quality paint whenever you repaint windows.", "2": "Expect to have to repaint your windows every second year.", "3": "Restore window paintwork as follows:", "4": "When repainting, you can slightly paint onto the putty next to the frame, in order to protect it as well as the frame.", "5": "Remove any paint that has splashed on the window using a cotton bud dipped in white spirit."}
things_needed: Paint,Masking tape,Sandpaper,Window putty (optional),Paintbrush,White spirit, cotton bud

title: How to Sew Vertical Hem Stitch (Couch Stitch)
summary: Vertical hem stitch, also known as couch stitch, is a durable form of stitching a hemline. The beauty of this hand stitch is that it is virtually invisible from the front side, making it ideal for couture sewing and provides for a neat, unobtrusive finish. Indeed, vertical hem stitch is ideal for working an unbroken, strong line. Here is how to sew it.
actions: {"1": "######Measure and prepare the hemline.", "2": "######Fasten the thread on the wrong side of the hem.", "3": "######Opposite the point at which you've brought up the needle, alongside the edge of the hem, begin the first stitch.", "4": "######Bring the needle down, holding it diagonally, the stitch through the edge of the hem about 6-10mm to the left of the stitch you've just made.", "5": "######Continue until the entire hem is completed."}
things_needed: Chalk, pins, iron or basting,Needle and thread,Thimble (optional but great for heavy fabric),Fabric

things_needed: Colander,Bowl iced water,Salad bowl

title: How to Create a Battery Tester
summary: Want to know if your batteries still have some life? Create your own battery tester
actions: {"1": "Get some enameled copper wire or wire obtained from the inside of a tube light choke.", "2": "Wind the wire over a tumbler and remove, so that it takes the form of a spiral.", "3": "Attach the spiral together by a string at two or more places, leaving the ends open, and fix it vertically over a board.", "4": "Tie a razor blade (or any lightweight, conductive metal) with a string horizontally and hang it at the top of the wound coil such that the blade is parallel to the coil.", "5": "Connect the two ends of the coil to any torch or other battery."}
things_needed: Copper Wire,razor blade,string,battery,board for base
